title: 524.3-109 STATUTES OF LIMITATION ON DECEDENT'S CAUSE OF ACTION.
text: No statute of limitation running on a cause of action belonging to a decedent which had not been barred as of the date of death, shall apply to bar a cause of action surviving the decedent's death sooner than one year after death. A cause of action which, but for this section, would have been barred less than one year after death, is barred after one year unless tolled.
